snippet: Members of a radical Mexican teachers union broke into or blockaded electoral offices in Oaxaca State on Monday amid threats to block Sunday’s midterm elections.
lead_paragraph: Members of a radical Mexican teachers union broke into or blockaded electoral offices in Oaxaca State on Monday amid threats to block Sunday’s midterm elections.

headline.main: Mexico: Teachers Union Members Damage Election Offices in Protest
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Teachers Union Members Damage Election Offices in Protest
